title: New: The Neighbourhood – Honest
content:
If I was President of the World, my first move would be to ban lyric videos.

Aside from that, this new track from The Neighbourhood is pretty great, and certainly acts as a marker showing how far they’ve come from the humble days of the Sweater Weather demo, way back when. This is the best Spiderman song since Chad Kroeger’s Hero. Check out Honest below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
